name: Caden Skinner
text: I did a create your own pizza. Ingredients were fresh and delicious. I would have given 5 starts but the staff was very slow. Would definitely recommend for a quick pizza joint.

name: George Rerat
text: The pizza was good, not great but good.. The crust was good, the sauce was on the great side, the cheese was on the great side, the sausage was on the good side. ‚Ä¶More

name: Chelsea Petersen
text:
We've tried to order from this place twice now.
Once from the website and the other time I tried calling, the messaging system says they don't take calls so we should order online and the website is unusable. ‚Ä¶More

name: Shelby Landon
text: I've always been really impressed with this place. The service is good and the staff is always super nice and attentive. I also appreciate that ordering online doesn't require downloading an app or making an account! You can even order a day out in advance. I totally love this place and I recommend it to everyone I know. Excellent!

name: Dylan Roberts
text: Nice place, I love that they have a lot of toppings to put onto your pizza. Been here a few times and the food has tasted good each time.

name: Mustafa Khalid
text: Due to Covid-19, many restaurants are takeout and some are even closed. Let‚Äôs all take a moment to thank the restaurants that are still open and providing food. Now, let‚Äôs get to the review. In Blaze Pizza, you get to make your own pizza ‚Ä¶More

name: Evan Davis
text: build your own, BBQ Sauce, shredded Mozzarella, Fresh Mozzarella, chicken, pepperoni, spicy Italian sausage, bacon, more shredded mozzarella on top. Trust me

name: Ethan Schaner
text: One of my other favorite pizza places to go to. I call it the Chipotle of wood fire pizza because it's affordable and amazing. Legit this restaurant is exactly what happens if you cross Punch Pizza with a Chipotle. I would definitely recommend that everyone should try Blaze Pizza. You will not regret it. Trust me. ‚ô•Ô∏è

name: Joseph Tillman
text: Went here yesterday to get curbside pickup. We tried to call the number they provided for curbside but it went straight to voicemail twice, so we had to go inside, despite their claim for contactless pickup. We go inside and they say ‚Ä¶More

name: Courtney
text: It shouldn‚Äôt give the option of curbside pick-up online if employees aren‚Äôt willing to bring it out. However food is always great.

name: Dreija
text: Update your hours online please. It says you close at 10 PM, got here at 8:54 PM, doors are locked and says you close at 9:00 PM. I don‚Äôt care that you locked the doors early, but I did waste time driving to a restaurant that says they‚Äôre open for another hour online.

name: Matthew Kowalski
text: Love how you can customize your toppings.   My 4 year old has customized how he eats his Blaze pizza. üòÜ

name: Sandhurst Drether
text: Pick your own toppings pizza, plus good array of drink choices including beer and box wine, cookies. Thin crust pizza, somewhere between chewy and crunchy. Just the right consistency and the kind of crust you want to finish off. Moderately priced. Good value for the cost.

name: Jacob Larson
text: This pizza really is one of the local's best and I'm surprised it doesn't get more rave from local press. ‚Ä¶More

name: Molly Lawson
text: Ordered two pizzas on the app and went to the store when it was time to ‚Äúpickup‚Äù The staff was very unorganized, did not have our pizzas in the oven yet and didn‚Äôt even know where our order slips were when I asked. After waiting 30 minutes ‚Ä¶More

name: Happy Me
text: High quality ingredients.  Variety of crust options from the standard thin crust which is great itself with ability to get a thicker, gluten-free or cauliflower crust for an additional charge.  Standard red sauce, spicy sauce or pesto sauce ‚Ä¶More

name: Andrew Kuempel
text:
Some of the best pizza around!!
Super fast service and fun atmosphere make this a no brainier when I'm anywhere near one. Just wish we had one in the Northern suburbs of the Twin Cities.

name: alex hummel
text: Great service! My girlfriend ate here and she was on crutches from her knee surgery. One of the kind employees stepped outside of the restaurant to open the door for her on our way out. Food was pretty solid as always. Thank you!

name: A W
text: Food is great, good prices, service is lacking. Waited 30 minutes in line. There is no efficient operation happening here or management anywhere to motivate the employees. Needs a lot of work.

name: Ryan Rampersad
text: Good made to order pizza, gets pretty busy and sometimes a pizza can get lost unless you watch like a hawk.

name: Brett Fricke
text: Best pizza around!

name: Denny Patel
text: This place require cleaning. So much garbage on kiychen floor and table where they make pizza

name: W.W. Blind
text: Fast service on a Friday night, despite a line all the way to the door we had our pizza in something like 15 minutes. Consistently delicious and fairly priced. Which is probably why they have a line. But it's worth waiting for.

name: Peter S
text: Pizza came so cold I was surprised she didn't walk here. Box was cold so I know the driver knew it when she handed it to me. If I hadn't paid online I would've refused it. Sad because I enjoyed the toppings and they have vegan cheese but it ‚Ä¶More

name: Anne Silva
text: So disappointing. This staff does not appear to care about their customers or the quality of the food they produce. Four workers... no acknowledgement from any of them, pointed to my pizza, no thank you... I left feeling very awkward. The pizza was so soggy and wet in the middle we couldn't eat it.

name: matt frost
text: Their pizza is awesome! One of the best things there is that if you are creating your own pizza you can put as many toppings on as you want and then you can add double for no charge. I thought their regular crust was great but I know for my ‚Ä¶More

name: Seth Summers
text: This place is worth visiting. They serve big portions for convenient rates. Regularly neat and with awesome atmosphere. Will visit here again.

name: Margem Okalwa
text: Blaze does NOT know how to cut in 8ths no matter how many times we ask. Two little slices to make it 8ths is not what I want. Blaze needs to teach the cutters the X-and-+ way of cutting even slices for 8ths. ‚Ä¶More

name: William Gilbert
text: Great food, amazing atmosphere. Pricing was reasonable and the food was amazing! We were referred to the restaurant by the owners step-dad. We will be back.

name: Dona Marthaler
text: This pizza is delicious. Most is thin crust but you can get thicker crust. This is a picture of the meat lovers but we were too excited to eat it that I forgot to snap a pic first! You can choose a specialty pizza or a build you own.  They also have salads, beer, wine, and desserts. You can also order online!

name: Bob Slavik
text: Tried Blaze pizza via door dash last night..it is outstanding quality. Nice thin crust with quality toppings and it‚Äôs a great value for a make your own pizza. Highly recommended!! We will definitely order again and again and again and..,

name: Demi Middleton
text: PIZZA was god but their service is slow

name: Emily A
text: This is a GREAT quick pizza place if you're just wanting some creative make your own pizza without a mess! Make sure to search for a BOGO before going (2 pizzas for 9 dollars!!) ‚Ä¶More

name: Dan Thompson
text: Good version of this concept, well executed.  Tastes good.

name: Ryan
text: Dirty restaurant. Employees did not all wear gloves with food. The restaurant gives you points for your purchases but apparently those points expire. Also the app rarely works so when you try to enter receipts they do not work. I used to buy pizzas often from you guys. I will never again buy one.

name: Lily Lloyd
text: FOOD WAS GOOD

name: camron boyce
text: We tried the shareable pizza. It is better to get the regular size. The toppings did not seem to meet a 14 inch pizza.  And it needs to be ordered online

name: Melissa Melissa
text: The pizza was okay tasting. We ordered two different ones and we were not impressed with either. I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôd give them repeat business. The sneeze guard was covered in food splatters, the counters were not wiped down, and the ‚Äúfresh‚Äù ‚Ä¶More

name: Christy Jaeger
text: Love this pizza!  Fast and friendly service. Crispy brick oven crust with fresh toppings.  My favorite is the ‚ÄúArt Lover‚Äù

name: Cody Baird
text: Word of warning: the spicy sauce has chunks of green peppers in it, but it doesn't say that anywhere, so if you don't like chunky sauce or green peppers you're likely to be duped like me. ‚Ä¶More

name: John D
text: Very good pizza, but location needs some tweaking.  Ingredients and food quality is great, but the restaurant is ALWAYS uncomfortably cold, and the staff are hit-or-miss.  Some are friendly and generous with toppings, others are rude and ‚Ä¶More

name: Hamza Tariq
text: The customer service here is phenomenal. A busy location but the always manage to get you serviced quickly.

name: kevos random stuff
text: Can't go wrong. If you don't like it you're a dope and added to many toppings.

name: Aaron Biel
text: Blaze is a delicious and speedy pizza chain, and probably not the most healthy.  But probably healthier than most of its fast food competitors.  However, that wide array of topping options offered enable the savvy pizza connoisseur to craft ‚Ä¶More

name: Lydia Kilburn
text: As usual they are consistently amazing! Great customer service, it's really shocking these days to find a place that's so welcoming and nice. Just wanted to give them a shout out! Thanks for not making me feel bad when I ask for extra of everything.

name: Abba Blum
text: Excellent service, friendly staff, Sierra is the young lady who took care of us was very pleasant and helpful. Food was fantastic.  A BIG 2 thumbs up

name: Keagan Kinsella
text: Always the best pizza, fast, friendly workers! Always hits the spotüòã

name: Christopher Oakes
text: Been there several times and am always pleased. Fast, friendly service with awesome pizza. Not the best pizza I've had, but for a fast, subway style restaurant, they are the best around. Fair price and as many toppings as you care to have. ‚Ä¶More

name: Ryan P.
text: Pizza can be good, but certainly not worth the price! Also, I find that you have to keep telling them to add more of what you choose. A lot of high schoolers, I find training seems to be an issue.

name: N Yager
text: Excellent pizza options for people with dietary restrictions (GF, Keto, etc). Food was great. Need to tidy up the place a little.

name: Thomas Pearce
text: I love the build your own pizza concept.   Awesome flavor. Great service. I can't wait to go back!

name: Alistair Mack
text: Fantastic and fresh food, I liked the character the place has, and the staff members were very nice. Will definitely visit here next time.

name: Zonna Tellurik
text: Overpriced. Just ok tasting.

name: ZENELL Smith
text: I Love the fact that you tell them how and what you want on your pizza. Everything very fresh.

name: Ravyn Benson
text: Great food, great people. We come often and if they ever do disappoint they make up for it, but usually it's just amazing food. New cauliflower crust is really good too.

name: Lathan Turbes
text: The food is really great the staff are good and I always love Blaze because they always give high above average entirely customizable pizza quickly. The building itself is good and has a nice atmosphere. Overall would highly recommend.

name: Samith Thomas
text: They had their order mixed up. Had to order all over again. Staff did not apologize.

name: April Entler
text: Good food!  Wish they had one in Lakeville!

name: Jaylene Haberman
text: Came for the keto crust which is ok but staff isn't the friendliest...at least at the St. Louis park one.

name: Amy Zillmer

name: DJ_Phatzo
text: Best pizza for the price

name: anjan kumar
text: The.l. Inception of this Blaze pizza is good ,but I had experience the chicken didn‚Äôt cooked properly ..otherwise staff and place is good..

name: Kim M
text: The pizza is really good, but the staff here at the St. Louis Park location are very crabby all the time.  Maybe they should hire some people who actually want to work and are friendly.  Whoever this Angie chick is really needs to find a new job.

name: Camren Blank
text: Normally your average pizza joint but slow service this night. Convenient being attached to the mall. It was a school fund raiser so we appreciate their participation.

name: Andrew
text: Lebron James is the G.O.A.T

name: Andrew Sincebaugh
text: Love this fast casual pizza place. Nice neighborhood spot with quick service, fresh high quality ingredients and unique yeah drink options. This is like chipotle for fresh baked pizza. Choose one of the signature pizzas like meat eater or ‚Ä¶More

name: Christopher de Alwis
text: Love the pizza here, you can't go wrong. Because you build your own. Quite a large choice of toppings. The staff were extremely pleasant on this visit.

name: Adriano Kimura
text:
Great pizza, awesome toppings, fast service, thin crust, one of the best pizzas I've had.
Wish we knew about this place before.  Just found out about it via a coworker.  We had to go Chicago for that now not anymore üòÅ

name: Victoria McGrogan
text: The high rise crust is vegan and amazing!!

name: Tyler F
text: Authentic, brick-oven flame cooked pizza. Piles of fresh ingredients. Great variety of drinks. That crust...they also offer GF. Price has gone up a bit so I took a star off.

name: Patrick Kortendick
text: Used to absolutely love this place, but the quality and speed have both gone down (and the prices up multiple times in the last year). My last visit took over 35 minutes for a to-go order. Still great pizza, but not nearly as good of a venue as it used to be.

name: R. W.
text: This St Louis Park, MN location has the best pizza and the people working there are pizza artists! Love the build your own pizzas for one price. We're gluten free and it's hard to find good places that have both regular and gluten free ‚Ä¶More

name: flyinhigh 808
text: Great pizza great staff and friendly. Highly recommended definitely.  You wont be disappointed trust me!

name: Christine Schermerhorn
text: It‚Äôs cheap and tasty and good quality. Healthy. Unlimited toppings.

name: Somaly Riebe
text: I love that I can have unlimited toppings. Really good place for pizza. Would recommend

name: Daniel Stenzel
text: My favorite pizza build your own down to the sauce!

name: Clare Anderson
text: They have really good üçï. It has a really nice thin crust!

name: Stephen Grant
text: Great build your own pizza with many options.

name: Libby Baker Sweiger
text: Blaze Pizza has terrific pizza and a great eating experience! We get a build your own pizza. Pick your crust! Regular,  extra thick,  gluten free. It's made right there. You can pick your sauce: red,  white,  garlic pesto. And get 2 kinds ‚Ä¶More

name: Scott Berry
text: Love the pizzas.  Order from the menu or build your own.

name: Nithyakalyni Jaipuriyar
text: Tasty pizzas and perfect place for kids!

name: Tyler Robb
text: Love the people and pretty unique pizza. Love the fireplace oven. Also serves beer and wine! I love that part :b

name: Kayla Johnson
text: Blaze Place is my favorite ‚Äúfast food‚Äù pizza chain. They always send out BOGO coupons to people who live in the area which I appreciate. I always feel guilty after eating a whole pizza to myself but it‚Äôs that good I can‚Äôt help myself!

name: Nick Bazant
text: Great pizza! Unique experience to see it made and cooked right it front of you.

name: Sachy Bullock
text: Love the thin pizzas with unlimited toppings. The dough knots are amazing if they are not burnt. ‚Ä¶More

name: Sabrina Datt
text: Fresh, hot pizza that comes with great customer service. I always enjoy visiting this location!

name: B H,Jr.
text: Personal pizza made to order, set up similarly to the Subway concept. The selection and variety of ingredients is great. Everything is fresh. You can create your own  gourmet pizza! I had a thin crust that was cooked perfectly. Reasonably priced.

name: Heidi Travis
text: Beware: The keto pizza crust is NOT keto! It contains brown rice, which is forbidden on a keto diet, as are all grains. Otherwise, the pizza is okay, if not lacking in toppings, but the crust is so thin it would collapse if they put more on ‚Ä¶More

name: Ross Treadway
text: Good pizza, with lots of options for toppings to get creative. They accidentally forgot the sauce on my first pizza, so they made me another, gave me the first, and sent me home with a voucher for another free pizza next time. Great service!

name: Pyotr Troyan
text: Each time we came there, it is very amazing to see them make the pizza in the oven. You can see how your pizza is made. Very great experience for kids and adults alike!

name: Alexa Lohrentz
text: You know a place has amazing service when you only left 5 minutes ago and you already want to write about it! Everyone was extremely friendly the entire time I walked through the line and was addressed as ma'am by every staff member. Not ‚Ä¶More

name: Austin Eschweiler
text: Awesome staff and some of the best, quick pizza you can find. If you're looking for a good and relatively affordable date meal, this isn't a bad option.

name: Anita Williams
text: Fresh thyme near in whenever I get a chance I will definitely be going back great pizza.

name: Callie Nimmo
text: delicious fresh pizza made to order just the way you want it. You get to watch the pizza makers prepare your pizza so you can get just the amount of toppings you want. So good!

name: Pat Addy
text:
Tasty personal pizzas. Nice spicy sauce.
Excellent cookie
Fresh juices.

name: Alex P
text: A build your own single server pizza place with a lot of options. If you do not know what you will want they have a few "pre-built" pizzas on the menu plus regular cheese and regular pepperoni. They do also have salads with the same kind of ‚Ä¶More

name: gayle deshong
text: Always delish!!!! Ordered 5 pizzas, one to go. All perfect. Outrageously good.

name: Austin Strand
text: Staff is alright, food is great. I work nearby and being able to leave work on my lunch break to have a personal pizza made to my liking is one of the best parts about Blaze Pizza. Whenever someone asks me about Blaze, I tell them its like Subway but with pizza.

name: Random guy with beard

name: Emma D
text: Food was tasty and there was a long wait though

name: J Roy
text: Okay spot for quick bute

name: Jason Siegfried
text: Pizza is good, not quite great. No complaints about staff

name: Monique Royster
text: I love the atmosphere, its build your own so its like your in line at a school cafeteria, just building your own pizza . i also love the stone oven, the  pizza crust comes out just right. Other than that i just love my pizza sauce a lil bit more sweeter. But its definitely a go see or eat.

name: Jon J. Olson
text: Consistant. Better then most fire oven pizza's. I had a build your own Supreme. Would definitely go back. Lot's of combinations....

name: Steven Juracek
text: Helpful and friendly staff, fresh and plentiful ingredients in a build your own style. You walk in, pick your crust, pick your sauce, pick your cheese(s), pick your meats and pick your veggies and they cook it very quickly. With the build ‚Ä¶More

name: Don
text:
Ok I‚Äôm a super pizza critic. This is by far in top 3. Bring a $10 bill and get ANY pizza ur heart desires, taxes included. Two major selling points:
1) thin crispy and fresh from their oven cooking methods. ‚Ä¶More

name: Noah
text: Just the best. The price and quality are unbeatable. $7 for any toppings and cooked in a stone oven to perfection. It tastes massively better than any major pizza chain as well as cheaper. Real ingredients/toppings, amazing sauces. The ‚Ä¶More

name: Jesse Olson
text: Amazing food! We need one of these in Andover, mn!

name: Sarah H
text: A favorite pizza place in the area, service seems to be slower lately, less engaged, but the food is good and they do a great job.

name: James Loyva
text: Great pizza crust, fantastic lemonade

name: Troy Pflipsen
text: Love the pizza and the excellent service.  But, BRING BACK STRAWS! Sippy cup covers suck.

name: amarnath immadisetty
text: Unlimited toppings at the very reasonable price. Love buy one get one coupons üòÉ

name: Alan Kesselhon
text: Absolutely great. My friend from Chicago was with me and said this is the first real pizza since he moved here. Sauce is great, get to make your own. So good.

name: greg moser
text: Pizza was good. Staff wasn't particularly friendly or outgoing to be honest. Looked for cracked red pepper and there were 3 jars in the entire dining room.. Had to go grab one from another table. Happy for the BOGO Facebook offer!

name: Pete Boisclair

name: Fernando Lino
text: I don't eat pizza often but this is an excellent inexpensive pizza where you pick all the toppings you want for a fixed price

name: Joe Piscaschmoe
text: I used to like going here more but the last visit the employees that made the food and cashier were half-checked out of reality. And I was double charged for something, so I had to sit there and wait while my pizza got cold as that was getting fixed.

name: Bill Thurston
text: Pizza was so good tonight.  Staff was great.

name: Christopher Jordan

text: Food was excellent and they have Vegan Cheese!!!!

text: Great pizza, made quickly. Friendly staff,  and wonderful service.  A great place to eat.

name: Avijit Das

name: Andrea Bolin
text:
Delicious build-your-own wood-
fired pizza. Options include more exciting toppings like ricotta cheese and roasted garlic. I love the pesto sauce. I wish there was a larger sized beverage cup - they offer only one size ~ 20 oz.

name: Mike Thompson
text: Pretty good pizza and I was glad to see a new business like Blaze Pizza filling their store with customers on a Friday night. The way that they structure their over the phone ordering through their 'call center' is frustrating and takes too ‚Ä¶More

text: Very delishish! The customer service was awesome too. If you like a lot of variety for toppings, this is the place to go. It's like a subway, but with pizza.

text: Pizza is usually great. 4 starts because sometimes they put less toppings than other times, also have gotten the wrong pizza a few times but I always check!

text: I'm like the way they treat people

name: Gene Grueschow
text: Good options but I think the crust quality has gone down. Super chewy the last time I ate there.  Price for a BYO went up since the last time I was there. Won't be back.

text: Great pizza. Made in front of your eyes, and at a phenomenal price. Very friendly staff whenever I'm there.

name: Nick Cairns

name: Dave Salzer
text: Don't order on line. They do the on line orders when they are not busy at best or ignore them at worst.  I ordered a large pizza outside the store (the only way to get a large pizza is to order on line) and then I went inside to wait. ‚Ä¶More

text: This place is amazing. If you like spice, the spicy red sauce is delicious. I always load my pizza with as many veggies as possible. The build your own pizza gives you the flexibility to have your pizza exactly how you like it. I usually ‚Ä¶More

text: Good service and good tasting pizza, cooked in a brick oven.

name: Irfan Quraishi
text: Pizza was a below average and one was burned and not a lot of flavor, service was very slow and seemed like they didn‚Äôt care

name: Brittany Tibbetts
text: The pizza was so fresh and customizable.

name: Angela Ponder
text: Mature staff.  Very knowledgeable, ready to work.  Great pizza. Lots of toppings. No added color to the lemonade and other flavor fruit drinks.  So excited to go back and try the rest.

name: Mike Tapio
text: Chipotle of pizza. Pretty cool build your own set up. Usually pretty delicious. The dude cutting them may need to slow down a bit and actually cut through them.

name: Jacob Myers

text: This brach has plenty of seats, quick seating. The mushroom pizza is this best in this branch. The service was quick and curtious. Always a treat coming to this branch.

name: Tom York
text: Best pizza on planet earth.  The pizza sauce is perfect.

name: Ted Blumberg
text: Pizza is terrific and a good value. The service is friendly but employees are often slow when taking orders. That's the only reason this isn't five stars.

name: Josh Solomon
text: I recently tried this place, and it was amazing. Great food and great staff. Will go here again.

name: Eagle
text: Best Pizza in the area bar-none. Since I discovered Blaze Pizza I have not wanted any other pizza company. The type of pizza you really wouldn't mind eating two nights in a row.

name: Pam Staples
text: My son is Gluten Free and I love how they ask if they need to do a glove change to help prevent cross contamination.  I do ask for the Gluten Free pizza to be cooked slightly longer.  Pizza is good and my son can get all of his favorite toppings. For a 6 yo, he likes green peppers, onions & sausage on his pizza.

text: Wood fire pizza is super tasty and there are a TON of toppings you can add to make your pizza ANY way you would like. You can have as many toppings as you want. Tons of veggies, fruit, vegan cheese, cheeses,meats, sauces, spices. Load them all on!!!

text: It‚Äôs a chipotle but with pizza! It reminds me of the old PizzaRev franchise that used to be around. The pizza‚Äôs are wood fired and they taste excellent. A BYOP is a bargain especially if you like a lot of meats and veggies. The cleanliness is top notch and the environment is very busy and modern.

name: Sam Miller
text: This place used to be awesome but they hired some employees who just barely function. Super busy and the employee making the pizza is moving like a damn snail. Just does not care about his job. Making everybody's order take so much longer than it should. A lot of them seem to not care about their jobs honestly.

Green Stripe and Red Vine pizzas are my two go-tos. Love the tomato sauce - actually tastes tomato-ey! :)
